PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-01372020-03-13,  ,  ,  IRCC, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Amendment of Certain Fees)
PrecisRegulations amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (AMENDMENT OF CERTAIN FEES) in order to reduce the subsidization burden on the taxspayer for permanent resident programs and services by sharing the cost burden more equitably with permanent resident applicants.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0045 Publication Date: 2020-04-01
AttachmentsAttachment
